actions.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Civil and Constitutional Rights

official_title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for four-year terms for Representatives, and to prohibit the candidacy of Representatives for the office of Senator.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Provides for staggered four-year terms for Members of the House of Representatives. Prohibits a Representative, during an elected term, from being a candidate for the office of Senator.

titles.title: A joint resolution proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to provide for four-year terms for Representatives, and to prohibit the candidacy of Representatives for the office of Senator.
